Windlord:::

"How many time do you need to repair the shields? " Windlord nodded 
and asked "and How many time agroup of bots like us could built a new 
base?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:

> Grounded looked up from his screen.  "Yes, we have lost a 
> extreme amount of energy, and my bio-shield is weak.  I can repair 
> that, and patch some wires that will provide some more energy, 
> but, we better hope we are not attacked again."
